Process: Collaborated with a team of eleven people, six of those developers
Worked in an Agile setting with two week sprints and multiple user stores per sprint
Created acceptance tests, time estimates, and subtasks for each user story
Performed code reviews to ensure code quality was maintained

Front-end: Continued developing a single-page web application using Angular.js
Transformed the frontend using FontAwesome Icons, Glyphicons, and Twitter Bootstrap

Back-end:: Used JAXB Objects to communicate between other subcomponents via an ActiveMQ queue
Developed a RESTful backend to service the HMI using Spring MVC and Java 8
Expanded upon existing Hibernate JPA Mappings for a PostGreSQL database
Ensured that the database migration was as painless as possible by using Flyaway
